content.text:
# Drama League Award for Outstanding Direction of a Musical

}}
The Drama League Award for Outstanding Direction of a Musical is a theater award presented annually since 2022 by The Drama League for the most outstanding director of a musical production of the theater season.
Alex Timbers has received the most nominations in the category, with three, followed closely by Leigh Silverman, Lileana Blain-Cruz and Susan Stroman with two nominations each.
